typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> tcross
tcross filter(CODE_TYPE_ID==106 && TARGET_CODE!='PI') ~> businessarea
xrefBusarea aggregate(groupBy(bus_description),
	bus_key = first(bus_key)) ~> deduplicator
deduplicator derive(grp_key = case(in(['EN','BU'],bus_key), 'EG', case(in(['PM', 'PF'], bus_key), 'PI', bus_key)),
		bua_grp_key = case(in(['EN','BU'],bus_key), 'EG', case(in(['PM', 'PF'], bus_key), 'PI', bus_key)),
		grp_description = case(in(['EN','BU'],bus_key), 'Energy+', case(in(['PM', 'PF'], bus_key), 'P&I', bus_description)),
		bua_key = case(in(['PM','PF'],bus_key), 'PI', bus_key),
		bus_bua_key = case(in(['PM','PF'],bus_key), 'PI', bus_key),
		bua_description = case(in(['PM','PF'],bus_key), 'P&I', bus_description),
		last_updated_by = 'm_pre_dim_business_area') ~> expression
businessarea select(mapColumn(
		bus_key = TARGET_CODE,
		bus_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefBusarea
expression select(mapColumn(
		grp_key,
		grp_description,
		bua_key,
		bua_description,
		bua_grp_key,
		bus_key,
		bus_description,
		bus_bua_key,
		last_udpated_by = last_updated_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> predimbusareatable
predimbusareatable alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(bus_key))) ~> alterrow
alterrow sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_business_area.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> predimbusarea
